headline: FirstEnergy Names Brian X. Tierney Chair of the Board
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) announced today that President and Chief Executive Officer Brian X. Tierney has been unanimously elected by the Board of Directors to the additional role of Chair of the Board, effective Jan. 1, 2025. He succeeds John W. Somerhalder II, who will remain a director of the Board. Lisa Winston Hicks will remain the Board's Lead Independent Director.

headline: FirstEnergy Corp. Declares Unchanged Common Stock Dividend of $0.425 Per Share
summary: The Board of Directors of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) today declared an unchanged quarterly dividend of $0.425 per share of outstanding common stock payable March 1, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 7, 2025.
